top.title: US optimistic on end to war as Zelensky says Ukraine to talk to US and Russia
top.summary: The meeting came as US envoy Steve Witkoff headed to Moscow for a meeting with Russia's Vladimir Putin.

top.title: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
top.summary: The vessel, named Grinch, was stopped by the French navy as it travelled through waters between Spain and Morocco.

top.title: ICE detains 5-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
top.summary: The boy was taken along with his father, the lawyer and school officials say. ICE says it was not targeting the boy.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

top.title: Bezos' Blue Origin announces satellite rival to Musk's Starlink
top.summary: Blue Origin will be focused on businesses and governments, while Starlink also offers services to individual customers.

top.title: Snap settles social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial
top.summary: TikTok, YouTube and Meta remain defendants in the case, which is due to kick off next week.

title.#text: Xbox Developer Direct 2026: the biggest games and announcements
Sony announces its first turntables in years
